item.title: Social Security is making a change that could disrupt service for millions of Americans
item.description: A slimmed-down workforce will handle cases on a nationwide basis — what does that mean for its 75 million beneficiaries?

item.title: Intel’s stock soars to a four-year high, raising the bar for earnings
item.description: Intel’s momentum reflects optimism about AI and manufacturing efforts, but analysts say earnings could underscore some challenges as well.

item.description: 100% of us should be doing these things.

item.title: This stock-market indicator just flashed one of its most bullish signals since 2000
item.description: Market timers ran for the exits after Tuesday’s big drop. That’s a good sign.
